dcterms:creator: Stanislaw Antol
Aishwarya Agrawal
Jiasen Lu
Margaret Mitchell
Dhruv Batra
C Lawrence Zitnick
Devi Parikh
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for Visual Question Answering (VQA) containing question-image pairs collected from the Microsoft COCO dataset. It includes train, validation, and test sets with questions categorized into different types such as YES/NO, Number, and Others.
dcterms:title: VQA v2.0

dcterms:creator: Kushal Kafle
Christopher Kanan
dcterms:description: A dataset designed to address the bias in VQA datasets by collecting 1.6 million questions divided into 12 categories. It is used for evaluating models on diverse question types and improving the robustness of VQA systems.
dcterms:title: TDIUC
